verses.verse: And <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> of it, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> of it:

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4480>within<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and <S%H4480>without,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> to it round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to be set <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>corners<s%> of it; even <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H935>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and one <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> beaten out of one <S%H4749>piece<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he them, on the <S%H4480>two<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the mercy <S%H3727>seat;<s%>

One <S%H259><s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7098><s%> on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the other <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7098><s%> on that <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H2088><s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853>he<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> on the <S%H4480>two<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> thereof.

And the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> spread <S%H6566>out<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on <S%H4605>high,<s%> and <S%H5526>covered<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat,<s%> with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H251>another;<s%> even <S%H413>to<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seatward<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof:
And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> thereunto a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

Also he <S%H6213>made<s%> thereunto a <S%H4526>border<s%> of a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> round <S%H5439>about;<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H4526>border<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> thereof.

Over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H4526>border<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H2885>rings,<s%> the <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7086>dishes,<s%> and his <S%H3709>spoons,<s%> and his <S%H4518>bowls,<s%> and his <S%H7184>covers<s%> to <S%H5258>cover<s%> <S%H2004>withal,<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853>he<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick;<s%> his <S%H3409>shaft,<s%> and his <S%H7070>branch,<s%> his <S%H1375>bowls,<s%> his <S%H3730>knops,<s%> and his <S%H6525>flowers,<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the same:

And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>sides<s%> <S%H6654><s%> thereof; <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the one <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6654><s%> <S%H259><s%> thereof, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the other <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6654><s%> <S%H8145><s%> thereof:

Three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made after the fashion of <S%H8246>almonds<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>knop<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower;<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like <S%H8246>almonds<s%> in <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>knop<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> throughout the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick.<s%>
And in the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like <S%H8246>almonds,<s%> his <S%H3730>knops,<s%> and his flowers: <S%H6525><s%>

And a <S%H3730>knop<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the same, and a <S%H3730>knop<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the same, and a <S%H3730>knop<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the same, according to the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it.

Their <S%H3730>knops<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the same: <S%H3605>all<s%> of it was <S%H259>one<s%> beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> and his <S%H4457>snuffers,<s%> and his <S%H4289>censers,<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
Of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of it was a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it a <S%H520>cubit;<s%> it was <S%H7251>foursquare;<s%> and two <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6967>height<s%> of it; the <S%H7161>horns<s%> thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the same.

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H853><s%> both the <S%H1406>top<s%> of it, and the <S%H7023>sides<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it: also he <S%H6213>made<s%> unto it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for it <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H2213>crown<s%> thereof, <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>corners<s%> of it, <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>sides<s%> thereof, to be <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> it withal.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of sweet <S%H5561>spices,<s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary.<s%>
